promptBox.question: What task would you like to accomplish?

advancedSettings.title: Advanced Settings
advancedSettings.webhookUrlDescription: The URL of a webhook endpoint to send the extracted information
advancedSettings.proxyLocationDescription: Route Skyvern through one of our available proxies.
advancedSettings.browserSessionIdDescription: The ID of a persistent browser session
advancedSettings.browserAddressDescription: The address of the Browser server to use for the task run.
advancedSettings.twoFactorIdentifierDescription: The identifier for a 2FA code for this task.
advancedSettings.extraHttpHeadersDescription: Specify some self defined HTTP requests headers in Dict format
advancedSettings.generateScriptDescription: Whether to generate scripts for this task run (on success).
advancedSettings.publishWorkflowDescription: Whether to create a workflow alongside this task run. Will also be created if "Generate Scripts" is true.
advancedSettings.maxStepsOverrideDescription: The maximum number of steps to take for this task.
advancedSettings.dataSchemaDescription: Specify the output data schema in JSON format
advancedSettings.maxScreenshotScrollsDescription: The maximum number of scrolls for the post action screenshot. Default is {{default}}. If it's set to 0, it will take the current viewport screenshot.

examples.hackerNewsTop: What's the top post on hackernews
examples.searchAAPL: Search for AAPL on Google Finance
examples.topFootballTeam: Get the top ranked football team
